thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UBM FY Revenue Rose 16.2 Pct To 1.003 Bln Stg

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UBM FY Revenue Rose 16.2 Pct To 1.003 Bln Stg
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Ubm Plc:
* FINAL DIVIDEND 18 PENCEPER SHARE * TOTAL DIVIDEND UP 6.8 PERCENT TO 23.5 PENCEPER SHARE * FY ADJUSTED OPERATING PROFIT FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS 294.2 MILLION STG
* FY REVENUE ROSE 16.2 PERCENT TO 1.003 BILLION STG * ‍“WE ENTER 2018, A BIENNIAL ‘DOWN’ YEAR, WITH GOOD MOMENTUM IN BUSINESS AS EVENTS FIRST STRATEGY TRANSLATES INTO PERFORMANCE” - CEO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
